cyberPilot.title: WindTre
cyberPilot.subtitle: Cyber Security Portal
cyberPilot.blurb1: Designed a self-assessment matrix to present various cybersecurity solutions to clients based on system-identified needs
cyberPilot.blurb2: Designed accessible reports for displaying collated cyber risk data in a personalised manner for presentation to decision makers at various levels of technical proficiency
cyberPilot.blurb3: Developed the interactive UI as a 'digital sales room' style environment for sales enablement
cyberPilot.blurb4: Designed a UI that's recogniseable as Windtre's, but different enough to be new and exciting

brembo.title: Brembo
brembo.subtitle: E-Commerce
brembo.blurb1: Benchmarked the existing e-commerce website against competitors and partners to drive sales conversions
brembo.blurb2: Created and wireframed a sitemap to identify opportunities for improvement in the site's usability, and identifyed existing opportunities on the current e-commerce website
brembo.blurb3: Identifyed potential opportunities for sales, brand and target markets in future developments of the website
brembo.blurb4: Mapped customer personas and journeys across a variety of generations and target markets

areaClienti.title: WindTre
areaClienti.subtitle: Re-design Client Portal
areaClienti.blurb1: Developed interactive user solutions and designed a secure self service portal
areaClienti.blurb2: Researched and implemented user journeys and use cases
areaClienti.blurb3: Designed logic systems for functional automations and developed a logic matrix for client support ticketing system
areaClienti.blurb4: Refactored and simplifyed the internal data structure, mapped existing components and created an optimized component structure

unifarco.title: Unifarco
unifarco.subtitle: Design System
unifarco.blurb1: Created a comprehensive, scalable, and detailed Design System
unifarco.blurb2: Used best practice methodologies to convert multiple design elements into standardised, reuseable components
unifarco.blurb3: Mapped components into an easy to use design library in Figma for various stakeholders
unifarco.blurb4: Provided guideance, mentorship, and feedback to junior designers throughout the project

ePaper.title: The Irish Times
ePaper.subtitle: ePaper
ePaper.blurb1: Designed a showcase website that would show off the exclusive ePaper feature, in one page only
ePaper.blurb2: Made the look and feel of the website as premium as possible
ePaper.blurb3: Included an infografic and a contact form, and fully responsive layout
ePaper.blurb4: Developed the design using SCSS and jQuery

customFit.title: CustomFit
customFit.subtitle: My M.Sc. Thesis
customFit.blurb1: Conceived an idea and market researched it
customFit.blurb2: Designed prototypes and researched the UX journey, collected data, and formed an initial project structure
customFit.blurb3: Finalised the project's data structure and UI design
customFit.role: UX research, UI Designed, Full stack development

pMp.title: patientMpower
pMp.subtitle: Data monitoring for chronic desease patients
pMp.blurb1: Examined the previous UI and user tested it
pMp.blurb2: Used test results to define an improved UX
pMp.blurb3: Designed the new UI around the new and improved UX
pMp.blurb4: Liaised with the development team to ensure the designs were implemented correctly

listen.title: The Irish Times
listen.subtitle: Listen
listen.blurb1: Researched the initial UX and branding for the new 'Listen' feature, led initial discovery
listen.blurb2: Gathered data and requirements and presented them to the rest of the team
listen.blurb3: Defined and ran initial tests on hi-fi mockups
listen.blurb4: Implemented testing results in the design process, designed and developed the UI using CSS and jQuery
listen.role: Discovery Lead, UX Research, UI Designed, Front-end development
